Description
True enables, this shipping option. If you select False, this shipping option will not be available. It will still be installed, just 'turned off.'

This field is where you set the table rates. For example: 20:5.00, 30:7.00, 10000:10 This would mean by price: $0-$19.99 = $5.00 $20-$29.99 = $7.00 & $30 or more would be = $10.00 By weight this would be: 0-19.99lbs = $5.00 20-29.99lbs = $7.00 30lbs or more will be = $10.00 By amount would be: 0-19 items = $5.00 20-29 items = $7.00 30+ items = $10.00
Choose if you want the shipping price set by the total price, amount purchased, or weight of the purchased items.
Enter a handling fee if you are charging in this field.
Choose if you want the handling fee charged per item or per box.
You can choose a tax class if you want to charge taxes on the shipping price.
As per Zen cart: Shipping - Based on customers Shipping Address Billing - Based on customers Billing address Store - Based on Store address if Billing/Shipping Zone equals Store zone
You can select a shipping zone from this drop-down menu, if you do, this setting will only apply to that zone.
The number you enter here will affect where this option will display on the modules list. Zero will be at the top of the list, and higher numbers will be further down the list.
pageTitle: Setup Table Rate Shipping in Zen Cart | Web Hosting Hub
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {556=This field is where you set the table rates. For example:   20:5.00, 30:7.00, 10000:10 }
textBeforeTable: You will see the Table Rate module listed, select it, then click the edit button to the right. You will see settings to the right. Choose your shipping settings: Roll your mouse over the Modules option and select Shipping. Login to the Zen Cart Admin panel. Edit the Table Rate Shipping Settings:   Select the Table Rate shipping module from the list, then click the +install button to the right. In the navigation menu select Modules, then Shipping. Login to the Admin Panel for Zen cart. Install the Table Rate Shipping Module: In this tutorial we will guide you through installing and configuring Table Rate shipping in Zen cart. We will first install the Table Rate shipping module, then we will go over how to edit the settings. 0 Comments: Published: Jan 11, 2013 2,118 Views: John-Paul Briones Written by Setup Table Rate Shipping in Zen Cart
textAfterTable: After making your selections, click the update button to save your settings. This shipping option will now be available to your customers, when they checkout. Congratulations, now you know how to install the Table Rate shipping module, and edit the settings in Zen Cart!
